attributes.action: pass legislation that limits the detainment of patients under the Mental Health Act 1983 in short-stay acute units to no more than four weeks since first admission.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When a patient is detained in a hospital under the Mental Health Act 1983 they can remain in the same place for a long period of time before suitable long-term care is identified. We would like to see a four week maximum limit introduced to ensure that the system works quicker to move the patient to the most appropriate place, or discharge them.
